title: Tea Scoop, 1931-64-31, 1844
markings: On reverse of stem: Dutch stamp indicating .833 silver fineness, used from 1814-1953; a helmeted head; a date letter: K for 1844; an indeciferable mark.
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Bell-shaped, notch-sided bowl. Short stem with stamped, fluted sides and stamped shell terminal.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
